description: A Level 1 English language course provides foundational instruction in basic grammar, vocabulary, reading, writing, and conversational skills for beginners
A Level 2 English language course builds on basic skills, focusing on improving intermediate grammar, expanding vocabulary, and enhancing reading, writing, and conversational abilities.
A Level 1 French course introduces beginners to basic French grammar, vocabulary, pronunciation, and simple conversational skills.
A Level 2 French course advances beginner skills by deepening knowledge of grammar, expanding vocabulary, and enhancing conversational and comprehension abilities in various contexts.
A Level 1 Spanish course offers foundational instruction in Spanish, covering elementary grammar, vocabulary, pronunciation, and basic conversation skills for new learners.
A Level 2 Spanish course builds upon foundational skills, delving deeper into grammar, expanding vocabulary, and enhancing conversational fluency for intermediate learners.
A Level 1 Italian course offers newcomers an entry point into fundamental Italian grammar, vocabulary, pronunciation, and crucial conversational abilities.
A Level 2 Italian course advances learners beyond the basics, focusing on deepening grammar understanding, expanding vocabulary, and improving conversational proficiency in Italian.
A Level 1 Russian course introduces beginners to fundamental aspects of the Russian language, including basic grammar, vocabulary, pronunciation, and essential conversational skills.

A Level 2 Russian course progresses beyond introductory skills, focusing on nuanced grammar structures, enriched vocabulary acquisition, and improved conversational competency for learners at an intermediate level.
